Configuration.description: The initial configuration setup for FOM OMS User Interface
Configuration.name: OMS User Interface

ConfValue.name: Web Service HTTP Transport Channel Type

ConfValue.description: Host address of the Archival service
ConfValue.name: Archival service Host Name

ConfValue.description: Port number of the Archival service
ConfValue.name: Archival service Port Number

ConfValue.description: Host address of the Jeopardy server
ConfValue.name: Jeopardy Server Host Name

ConfValue.description: Port number of the Jeopardy Service
ConfValue.name: Jeopardy Service Port Number

ConfValue.description: Enable the Record count fetch for pagination. This will make the data fetch slower and enable Last Page option in pagination.
ConfValue.name: Enable Record Count Fetch

ConfValue.description: OMS UI Short Date Format (Day [dd] , Month[MM] and Year [yyyy])
ConfValue.name: OMS UI Short Date Format

ConfValue.description: OMS UI Long Date Time Format (Day [dd] , Month [MM], Year [yyyy], Hour [HH], Minute [mm] and Seconds [ss])
ConfValue.name: OMS UI Long Date Format

ConfValue.description: OMS UI Long Date Time Format (Day [dd] , Month [MM], Year [yyyy], Hour [HH], Minute [mm], Seconds [ss] and Timezone [z])
ConfValue.name: OMS UI Long Date Format Timezone

ConfValue.description: OMS UI Long Date Time Format (Day [dd] , Month [MM], Year [yyyy], Hour [HH], Minute [mm], Seconds [ss], Milliseconds [SSS] and Timezone [z])
ConfValue.name: OMS UI Long Date Format with TimeZone and Milliseconds

ConfValue.description: Default tenant information
ConfValue.name: Default tenantID

ConfValue.description: Application name to show on actuator info endpoint
ConfValue.name: Application Name

ConfValue.description: OMS UI PlanItem Display Template for Grid View. Possible template variables are - PlanItemID, PlanFragmentID, ProductID, Action and Description; these template variables are case sensitive and have to be specified within curly braces {}. Different template variables can be combined with any type of delimiter e.g. {PlanFragmentID}|{PlanItemID}
ConfValue.name: PlanItem Template for Grid View

ConfValue.description: OMS UI PlanItem Display Template for Gantt View. Possible template variables are - PlanItemID, PlanFragmentID,ProductID, Action and Description; these template variables are case sensitive and have to be specified within curly braces {}. Different template variables can be combined with any type of delimiter e.g. {PlanFragmentID}|{PlanItemID}
ConfValue.name: PlanItem Template for Gantt View

ConfValue.description: OMS UI PlanItem Display Template for Dependency View. Possible template variables are - PlanItemID, PlanFragmentID, ProductID, Action and Description; these template variables are case sensitive and have to be specified within curly braces {}. Different template variables can be combined with any type of delimiter e.g. {PlanFragmentID}|{PlanItemID}
ConfValue.name: PlanItem Template for Dependency View

ConfValue.description: For SSL Configuration value should be ssl
ConfValue.name: Constant that holds the name of the environment property for specifying the security protocol to use in Tibjms JNDI lookups.

ConfValue.description: For SSL enable verify host value should be false
ConfValue.name: Constant that holds the name of SSL property specifying if client should verify the server certificate in Tibjms JNDI lookups.
